name: TUG: PRISON BREAK
description:
When you were taken to the local prison you weren't planning on a long vacation from crime, it's time to escape!

This is a click to play game. For new escape room players tidbit and tricks and hint sheet for has been added to aid players. 

There are currently TWO different ways to escape, one is the easy route and the other is the harder route. Please feel free to try out both endings. Remember you only need one rope to escape!

Google Forms Doc Alpha 1.2:

https://forms.gle/RaHBF7bickjHUUpV6
